v_content: Great off shore glasses
Son súper cómoda

Wow, I love these sunglasses.  I’ve owned Costa Sunglasses for over 22 years.  These are my favorite pair.  Going from the Fantails to these Tuna Alley’s.  The biggest difference I see is that the Tuna Alley’s have the 3 small holes that allow the glasses to “breathe”. My Fantails did not have these holes and would constantly fog up. Lens quality and clarity is fantastic.  Typical great Costa’s

I bought these straight from Costa not knowing you could buy them from Amazon. I use the copper silver mirror for fly fishing and I love them. I am super happy with them and have use them a lot on the water. I have been using the wrong retainers that were way to small for the sunglasses and I ended up bending that back part of the frame that goes near my ear. Just recently found out Costa has  retainers that would specifically fit the tunna alleys. These are really good sunglasses but they are a little too techy to wear around town
Great pair of sunglasses.
Great sunglasses
My husband loves his new costas!!!! Great price, delivered on time and was exactly what he wanted!
Worth the money
Costa sunglasses are always top notch.  I've got 5 different styles and have never had an issue with quality.
My husband likes them very much.
These glasses are so freaking clear

Whether you are a boater or not, these sunglasses provide outstanding quality and clear viewing with the glass lenses. Everything is enhanced and make for a really great experience no matter what activity you might be doing in the bright sun.

The real deal! I was worried at such a discounted price they would be defective or the plastic lenses but nope. Brand new, no defects and the 580g glass lens. Before I ordered these costa’s I went to cabelas sporting good store to check em out and this exact same sunglasses $269 which is crazy, I went home and checked Amazon and got em about 50% less than retail for exact same thing. Very satisfied with my purchase. By the way, the glass lenses have a “580” engraved on the right lens... the plastic lenses have a “580P” engraved.
I love the look and the value !
I'D BUY THEM AGAIN.
I don't buy much on the amazon but this glasses was the best product I buy out of amazon. I am happy of the buy
I wear these everyday!  Best sunglasses I have ever owned!!!
Perfect for Florida... fit excellent and polarized to perfection
Very nice
Fit great, look great on. Made super well. Nothing flimsy here! Love them!
They have a weight to them that I appreciate.  The design is cool and I love the shades...makes my eyes see everything I want, especially in bright sunlight. Thank you!

My wife absolutely loves these glasses. They are a larger frame with great polarization! I will admit that the case was delivered with a zipper tooth missing , contacted the seller, they sent out a replacement case immediately. Got it in 3 days!
Great product!
Read other reviews that said lens wasn't glass etc.
I bought these for my husbands birthday and he's a huge fisherman, He absolutely loved them!
Best sunglasses I've ever owned. They are nice, clear and make everything look awesome ??
Solid construction, fit perfect in my big head!!!  Amazing clear view.

Best Costa sunglasses I have ever owned, larger frame is a great fit, glass lenses are super clear.  Did not notice any difference in the weight over poly carb lenses. Costa lenses are a Total game changer for fishing. Purchased from Great Lakes Outfitters, excellent customer service and customer experience.  Highly recommend Great Lakes Outfitters!!
Great fit. Just as described. Lightweight and comfortable.

The sun glasses came as represented, great quality, light weight, made is USA (according to the box), genuine Coasta product.  The price was right and have owned a few pairs of "top end" sun glasses and these have the features and build quality matching other brands in this price range.  Received with case, cleaning cloth and delivered inside Coasta box.  Happy with my purchase.
He loves them !
love these glasses. I will only Buy Costa from now on. Everything about the sunglasses are perfect. Very fast delivery and well-packaged.
Ordered Tuna Alley style but retailer was sold out.  Tried the Jose, very close to Tuna Alley.  Love the fit for larger head,
Best sunglasses I've been wearing costumes for 35 years nothing beats them for fishing and all around everyday use

Not like the picture but read details. The best sun glasses out there I jus bought one more to have.  They fit perfectly and love the look. Worth the price and if they break send them in for 10 bucks and get a new pair.
Excellent
They are straps and are Costa, the quality speaks for itself like the name.
So far this product has been performing well.  No issues in the first couple weeks of use.
Would like the rubber grommets to be a little more accepting (I wear Slack Tides) but this is a good lanyard.
Work
Works with Ray Bans
Whether you own a pair of Costa sunglasses or not, these set of straps work really well. Just bought a second one, as the first one wore out after four years of heavy use. Worth it!
Great strap. Attaches to the ends of the arm not in front of your ears so doesn’t hit the side of your face. Buying 2 more

I looked a long time for something that would fit the arms of my glasses, which are the thinner design at the ends where these would connect. These are easy to fit and never come off. They are light so I actually forget they are even on. I like that they don't make me look like a geek or an old guy! LOL!
Perfect for fishing, light and comfortable.
The glasses are so comfortable and nice!!
N/a
This is the second pair I have bought off of Amazon. Love the look and fit. The price here is always great. Will probably buy more.
The glasses were just as described in the overview. Very lightweight and comfortable

This was a birthday gift for my husband. He put them on for a test drive. Its hard to buy sunglasses for someone else. He mentioned the comfort on his nose and it wasn't too tight behind his ears. Whew !! I hit the mark on this one.
Love my Costas. This is my 2nd pair. I wo t buy any other brands
Really great size. Not huge, but a good size, and fits the face well. Lightweight, but feel like quality.

Have always heard how awesome Costa sunglasses are... and the hype is real! Theres a reason why people who live in the sun, often on a boat wear these glasses. They are extremely comfortable, very stylish, and perform. I have owned many different pairs of polarized sunglasses in the past, but these lenses are the clearest I have ever worn. I opted for the glass lenses and they are still very lightweight. I have a medium sized face and opted for the smaller "Rinconcito" model and they fit great, still on the large side, but very stylish and have great coverage for my face. Highly recommend these shades!
Thought the clips for the ear pieces would be uncomfortable, but you can even tell that they are there.
Loved everything about the product
Cambiaría o mejoraría los enganches por algo menos vistoso y más cómodos.
The fasteners are great, clip is sturdy and looks great
Great.
They fit my Spearo and just work very well.
It was exactly as I expected, just what I was looking for thank you.
Love the color and quality of material
Safety/ Sun/ prescription glasses. I use these for almost all my glasses retention.
Very good product for the money

I like everything about it other than they way it secures to the ear piece.  If you wear any kind of headphones which I do for exercise and at work it squeezes the plastic piece to your head and starts to ache after a while. If you’re not a person that wears headphones then this is a great product!  It has a pretty good length for people who want their glasses to hang lower, but also adjustable if you want shorter.
Ear peices didnt connect the way I expected..but it's fine. Doesnt hurt or rub my ears.
Perfect for people who wear sunglasses a lot but don’t like putting them on top of their head.
Perfect for my Costa sunglasses!
Fitted great and simple to install!
Product does what it is suppose to!!
Igual
They do not seem quite as sturdy as my pair with glass lenses, but I love wearing them.
My wife does not like sporty looking glasses. But she loves these. They are not to dark and fit a smaller head and face perfectly.
Lenses make everything look clear. Style is awesome
Love these shades.. & my favorite color
I love them. List my first pair after double cataract surgeries.  Will never wear anything else.
Looks great!!
Love how the glasses totally cover my eyes.
Awesome! I love the feel and look of these. They fit my narrow face and relax my eyes.

Great sunglasses! Came in on time and were in great condition when received. Trying to add as many useful photos to this review as when I was considering purchasing them I couldn’t find what they looked like on an actual person. These sunglasses came in a cork case. Would definitely recommend purchasing these!
Driving, fishing, waking, pretty much for everything
Absolute perfection, the best sunglasses I’ve ever owned
They fit snug....wont fall in the water while fishing.  Super comfortable.

I love Costa's. They are great lenses. Theses South Points fit securely on your head. My wife was in Naples with friends who were wearing super expensive designer sunglasses. She said here try these, they tried them and then asked are these prescription glasses. Needless to say they saw things threw the Costas that they were missing through their over priced Designer glasses.
excellent glasses

These are some of best glasses I have every had. The only thing better was the old Costa Deep Blue DB-10 frames in tortoise. Anyway these are the widest, most comfortable frames made by Costa. Try to keep them away from insect repellant and sunblock because these will degrade the rubber padding on the frames.

Costa makes the best shades in the $100-$200 neighborhood. They have mega-pairs to choose from to embrace any desired styling. You will find correct form, fit, and function in spades, without reservation.
Driving
Great price for these sunglasses

Best sunglasses I have ever have.  Glad I did my research to find the clearest lenses on the market. No glare and my eyes don’t get fatigued.  I even use them at night in my room watching TV as it filters out the blue light that affects my ability to fall asleep. Still very clear for a bright TV at night.

I bought these for my fiancé because he complained about his other glasses being too bulky and hot. These are lightweight and don’t cover the face too much. He loves how comfy they are. They’re a great pair of glasses.
I like but very small for me

Long time costa user - love their lenses, but normally have trouble finding a frame/style that i like (more of a wire-frame type of person). I have been using the now discontinued Palapa glasses from Costa for 2 years and they have been great (480 green mirror). Comparing these new Turrets to them is night and day. The first thing you notice is how lightweight the Turrets are... not on the level of Maui Sports, but very very light and they feel very sturdy and premium. For me personally, they also fit my head much better, and the bridge is much more snug - but not tight.
Really good quality
My husband loved them. A great deal too.
good
Quality is very good, excellent.
Excellent service and delivery fantastic glasses would recommend
Fits perfect, comfortable,will buy another pair in future!!!!
Love them!
Love my Costas!!

I ended up returning the Isabelas and went out and bought the Gannet sunglasses. Isabelas have a wide bridge. They didn’t slide down but would only sit 1/2” from my eyebrows. Sunglasses should at least be just below the brows and line up with the hairline when viewed from head on. Everything about these are extraordinary. They are well made and beautiful. The clarity is incredible. This was my first pair and will be the only brand I buy now. The website for Costa has good suggestions for sizing. I bought the Isabelas from Amazon and they were authentic. Research what to look for in fakes, I took them to our Costa store to make absolutely sure.
They Are NOT THE ONES I ORDERED BUT I DO LOVE THEM!!! WASN'T GOING TO GO THROUGH ALL THE HASSLE OF SENDING THEM BACK>>>> SO I AM GOING TO WEAR THEM AND TAKE CARE OF THEM!!!
I ordered green lenses and I recieved blue. The picture shows more green in the tort frames but they are so dark they look black.
Great quality and optics from COSTA. its all i wear.  Get them if your in the sun all day
Best purchase I’ve ever made through Amazon!
These were a replacement for the same pair I purchased locally.  I saved over $100 buying these from Amazon.  Well worth the price!

I had these exact sunglasses from a few years ago, my husband got them at a big retailer for double the price. It was time for a new pair so I decided to check amazon and took the chance since the price was so good. They are exactly the same as the ones I had before and I love them! I would definitely recommend them!
Love these glasses!

The sun glasses came as represented, great quality, light weight, made is USA (according to the box), genuine Coasta product.  The price was right and have owned a few pairs of "top end" sun glasses and these have the features and build quality matching other brands in this price range.  Received with case, cleaning cloth and delivered inside Coasta box.  Happy with my purchase.
He loves them !
love these glasses. I will only Buy Costa from now on. Everything about the sunglasses are perfect. Very fast delivery and well-packaged.

Best sunglasses I've been wearing costumes for 35 years nothing beats them for fishing and all around everyday use

Not like the picture but read details. The best sun glasses out there I jus bought one more to have.  They fit perfectly and love the look. Worth the price and if they break send them in for 10 bucks and get a new pair.

Lenses were great just didn't care for the frames. The look was very rough and heavy for sunglasses. Just my personal preference. Also it looked like they were returns. Smudges on lenses and no cleaning cloth. Returned these and ordered a different style straight from Costa website. Better to avoid the middle man I'm thinking.

Great quality for the price. The best in the polarized game. I find whales and Dolphins for a living, and this has upped my skills tenfold. A little irritating behind the ears due to the grooves on the arms in that area, but otherwise comfortable and lightweight. LOVE that they’re made of ocean plastic too!

Let me get this out of the way: these are expensive glasses. And the fit and finish on them is what I will call "slightly rustic" due to the fact that they are made from recycled fishnets. However, they have a lot going for them! First off: they're made in the USA. Depending on your location, that could be a major factor for you. The included carrying pouch is very nice as well. And they are made from recycled fish nets, which helps with plastic pollution.

frames are made from recycled fish nets and the lens quality are out of this world. these lens make all the colors pop and allow your eyes to truly relax.' black' frames do have a grayish tint to the them and the orange lens are not as orange looking as the photo shows BUT great quality.
Great look, great lens, but the frame is uncomfortable around the ears.
I FREAKING LOVE THEM!!!!!
For plastic lens sunglasses, these are the best looking, clearest, and best detailed sunglasses I've ever owned.  Maui Jim is also very good.
Awesome sunglasses
Great Fishing or beach sunglasses
Costa’s are the best sunglasses!
Didn’t like that these were plastic lenses instead of the glass lenses. Everything was identical to my glass pair but these lenses are plastic
Very comfortable,  lots of compliments
Just as pictured!
Bought this to replace my Ray Bans and I'm so glad I did!  I bought the 580G and it's helped so much with the glare. Excellent quality and price point.
Not too girly (that part was perfect for me), perfect for outdoors. Nice enough for my boyfriend to steal them, he wears them all the time now.
I was very skeptical. The price just didn’t match the costa website for the same item. I received the glasses and they are exactly as described.
Great clarity but a bit heavy with the glass lens. I’ll try the plastic lens on next purchase
Arrived on time and these sunglasses are costa Del Mar clear. So nice on the water and everyday wear. I have the 580p lenses for reference. Would buy again!
Great sunglasses! They stay on your face even during extreme activities.

Very satisfied with the sunglasses. I was fortunate enough to get a great price, and from order date to home in 5 days!

light weight easy to wear

Awesome my husband love it. The problem is I was included a gift message. I expected also is wrapped as a gift. But nothing comes out what I had expected. Overall the sunglass was perfect, clear and comfortable very light my husband so happy with it.

Love them
Great polarized sunglasses. I got them for my fiancé and he loves them. He has a smaller head so they fit great.
Fit and look is great. Great lens clarity. Makes driving easier for the eyes. It will be interesting to see how they do out fishing. The wayfarer frame may be too open for the water but we will see.
Nice style, lense clarity is very good. They are a little flimsy though. Would have given them a 4 if not for that.
Love it.  Perfect

Well they wasn't glass lenses ,like I wanted . But they fit perfect and there a lot more crisp, looking through them from my tuna ally ones . Great for driving, I'm really impressed on the fit and feel... I recommend them if your not using them for fishing..
Speedy delivery, great sunglasses!
I bought these as a spare pare of glasses to leave on my boat.  I got the 580p lens everybody recommended.  The lens is great!
Good fit, quality material, look great.
Love these!
Got these for my Husband and absolutely loves them!  Best he has ever had!

I loved my Costas but eventually they did break.  Contrary to the last review I called Costas repair line today and the glasses were discontinued so they could not fix them but they said I could pick out any pair of glasses I wanted for the price of what the repair would be.  I am now paying ten dollars for a new pair of costas great customer service great glasses great company.

Nice design but color is not the same as what's shown on the website....finish is a little more transparent and not that "matte" appearance you see on the site. I also didn't like that people can see your eyes pretty easily through the lens....was expecting to be more reflective.
Costa Del Mar is a excellent brand of sunglasses. Living in FL I would not own another brand. Amazon offered me a great product at a good price and excellent shipping.
Christmas gift for my son, and he loves them!
good product

Costa is now in my opinion and in the last several years the gold standard for sunglasses and all I will wear (yes it gets expensive lol) When I received these, the frame was slightly tweaked, nothing to do with hinges or wearability. Just enough to be annoying when buying such a high end pair of sunglasses. Took them to a local prescription glasses store as was recommended by the representative at my local sunglass hut inside cabela's. They apply some heat on the plastic just enough to be pliable and straighten them out. This did cost me money to get done. It was nitpicky and again didn't affect overall wearability. Highly suggest the aransas over ray ban if you're looking for a wayfarer style frame
Love everything about the glasses
I bought this for my husband and he loves it. Sturdy and trendy.
Love glass lenses, once you go to glass polycarbonate is never good enough again.

100% Authentic. Literally ordered these Thursday received them Friday. Seller very responsive to messages and questions. Why pay $250 when this seller offers legit Costa glasses for $100 less. No brainer. Now on to the glasses. I have high end Oakley’s and ray bans.. even Oakley’s with revant elite replacement lenses and these 580 g lenses are absolutely ridiculous. No glare crystal clear clarity and full on polarized. Anyone who spends a lot of time near water I highly recommend.. don’t be cheap either and go with the plastic lenses... try actual glass lenses and you won’t go back!
Value for money

The lens quality is superb. The scratch resistant is great. I've dropped them and  had it hit the dirt. On other pairs would be damaged or scratched. These had no blemish or marks on the lens. So very durable. But the best part about them is that the clarity of the lens is amazing. Soothing in bright sunlight and cuts through the glare without having to squint. I own several pairs of expensive brand sunglasses. I feel the lenses are more clear then my most expensive glasses. Also the style is very complimenting. Seems to be very similar to holbrook's which I like a lot. The frames are extremely durable and will take plenty of abuse without having to worry that your going to break or snap the arms. I accidently sat on them. I have to I was extremely surprised that it survived the rear end crush test.
Value for the $
I like all features. Used for driving,sitting outside.
Very good !!
Great styling, good quality, very good value. What more could anyone ask for?
They are beautiful and elegant glasses.  But it may be a bit heavy for the glasses that I used previously

Lenses scratched within a few days of regular wear and tear. They’re reasonably lightweight, but not as light as my old pair of RayBan Wayfarers. I bought these as a test run for Oakley Holbrooks. They’re easier on the wallet, but I’m disappointed they scratched so easily. Decent sunglasses for the price.
Everything ok so far. But too early for a review
Love the style & polarization

I was concerned about purchasing these on Amazon for authenticity purposes. These have the 580 etched in the lens. They are comfortable fitting. They kind of round-out around the head and grab behind the ear. They have a bit of metal in the legs so you can bend and adjust to your comfort level to some extent. They are front heavy, due to the glass lenses. The picture shows everything they came with, except for the box and a sticker. I dig 'em.
Love these glasses!!!
Love these glasses.  I bought them for driving not fishing - PERFECT!
I was questioning purchasing these as I’ve always worn the “Riverton” style but I was so pleased with the quality and style of this pair !! Would definitely purchase again !
My favorite sunglasses yet, Love them more than my Ray-Ban‘s and my Kaenon
Perfect. Look great. Also they block the sun!
Too wide
They could be fake..... But I compared with the ones in store, and it's incredibly difficult to tell if they are. Good deal
Costa Del Mar does not disappoint. Great when out on the water !
I ordered these for my husband. They are perfect!
Awesome Costa DelMar sunglasses, very comfortable and sleek design.

My husband is 6’4 with a bowling ball for a head. He has worn the the same pair of Zane Costas for 7 years. His are cracked and worn like no other. I figured it was time to get him a new pair. Sometimes he would complain about them being too tight above his ears so I decided to buy him the Blackfin Costas. The Blackfin has a 62mm width. He said the Blackfin was a better width and the lenses wrapped around the eyes which was great for keeping light out, but he hated the rectangular frame. So we switched the Blackfin back for the Zane and he is a happy camper. They are a little tight on his head but he says they will loosen as he wears them.
Son perfectas lo único es que dice que los lentes son de vidrio y no es así son plástico
Is not the same
Very nice shades
Excellent purchase and fast shipping
I bought these for my teenage daughter for Christmas. She loves them!
Gotta wait for the sun to finally come out but they fit & look great on my wife!
Good quality sun glasses
These are not as mirrored as I expected them to be. Love the shape & fit & really like the glasses. Wish they had been darker though. But definitely quality product!
Love love love this color and the style. The look great on my face. Also, very quick shipping from the seller.
Good item love it.

This is my 4th pair of costa sun glasses. I love these as they are very light weight. I like the non slip on the nose piece. I have had both plastic and glass lense and would by far recommend the plastic lense. They are so much more lighter on the face especially when your perspiring.
Nice fitment. Good quality glasses
Love these Costa's. Great price and great look!! The lightest pair of Costa's I own, by far!
Awesome sunglasses, prompt arrival!

I just found my new faves! These glasses are beautiful. They fit nicely and are a great frame size and shape for my face. They stay on nicely while out and don’t slip which is a huge plus as I live in a warmer state. I had read so many good reviews on these glasses I decided to order two different styles. I also ordered the Anaa rectangular glasses but they were missing from my delivered shipment today. That being said, customer service quickly responded to my concerned email and we are working to remedy the situation. I will update further when resolved. That is my only reason for 3 stars as I actually very pleased with the glasses I did receive.
Great fit, great frames, great lenses.
I love them but they are a little tight in the sides
Great sunglasses. Light weight and super cute.
Perfect fit!

I love Costa sunglasses. This is my 3rd pair and they didn’t disappoint. I used to be the type to say why on earth do people spend that kind of money on sunglasses, but I totally get it now. Such great quality. These look great and are crystal clear to look through. I keep them in the included case for protection when not wearing them and love the included cloth to wipe them down. If you haven’t bought a pair of costas yet, go for it. I highly recommend the glass lenses.
love the colors and fit of the Costas
Love the quality and extras.
I’m a diehard Costa girl! Great look, lasts for years and love the polarized lenses that are perfect for driving, the beach and everyday!
I wouldn’t buy any other brand of sun glasses. They do their job and look fantastic
Wish I knew they won’t put my eye prescription in them.
The best sunglasses!!! Wish I bought them sooner! I am very sensitive to bright light and these sunglasses I don't even squint! They fit so well that I forget that they are even on.
Good deal
Best sunglasses for a narrow face! Bought two pairs. They look great on anyone! Highly recommend!
This model offers an excellent fit and look for a woman with a narrow face

Great value. I love Costa glasses for my sensitive eyes.  These were a much better value than if I had purchased them at a sunglasses store or a sporting goods store. If you have a wider face get the Waterwoman II.
Love being able to see more clearly at the perfect density than any former pair
Just a gorgeous pair of glasses and a great price for the quality
She makes them look good so..........
So very comfortable and stylish too.
I loved the look of these glasses but they were to small for my head. They didn’t fit.
Gave this to a friend as a gift and they loved them!
Great clarity. Need to have them adjusted a bit, but for the most part the fit nice. Have had many compliments.
Nice and fast delivery.  These are very nice, a bit wider than I thought but the material is heavy and not cheap like some other costas I’ve ordered. The hinges are tight. Love these!!!
These are great. Fit just like reeftons in a bigger frame and lens.
Great glasses
Nice fitting and nice looking.  Very impressed with these sunglasses!
Looks just how I pictured!

Perfect fit and love the look and colors . These are a perfect fit for my big ol' head ! It's hard to find sunglasses that fit me and I was not a big fan for paying this much for a pair of sunglasses. Because I go through sunglasses often lost,broken,saltwater damage or just don't hold up , but these are perfect . Plus anything goes wrong withe them Costa will replace at no cost to me . Also I was afraid they were going to be fakes but they are the real deal.
Best lenses I’ve ever looked through.

These are amazing. I'm a big man with a big head, and these fit perfectly, without looking small. The vents are nice, but they still fog up if I go from cold truck AC to 110 degree humid Texas air, which is to be expected. They also do great when riding my motorcyle. I couldn't be happier with these.

I thought the price was too good to be true.  I got Costas but the ones I got must be "seconds" or have defects where they cannot be sold at retail.  Right lens is loose and easily pops out.  Would not buy again.
Bought before and lost them in the water. Bought the exact pair again.
I have had many pairs of Costa's and love them.  If you ever have an issue, they are great to work with and take care of you fast!
The type of glasses you expect from Costa del mar.
Fit well.
Fishing n driving.  Awesome
Great sunglasses, unfortunately I have a large head and the glasses were too small for me. More detailed info on size of glasses would be helpful in description. Thx

I wanted a pair of polarized glasses for fishing and I have always bought cheap but decided to spend the extra money. As soon as I put them on I could tell the difference in the lenses. I might even buy another pair

Love Costa’s customer service and how quickly they respond to issues. Whether repairs or warranty work, they always come through. The glasses themselves are also great and there are tons of choices of frames and lenses. Have worn so many brand names over decades and I’ll stick with Costa!
Fantastic glasses, my new favorite and fantastic service from sellers!
Look ok but made for someone with a smaller head
The best way to explain these glasses is to tell you these glasses are like sex on your eyes!!!!

I ordered these to replace a pair of misplaced Costa Tuna Alley glasses.  Even though Costa says they are sized the same, these Saltbreaks are more narrow.  Also, the reflective coating creates halos around oncoming traffic's daytime running lights.

Deep Six Sunglasses claims your order will be shipped 2-3 days after you place the order.  They shipped mine the same day!  I got exactly what I was looking for!  This is my 4th pair of Costa’s (losing them sucks), and they are the real deal.  I HATE wearing anything else.  Thank you Deep Six!

Already have a pair of Costa Del Mar Tuna Alley shades and love them. Thought I'd give these Corbinas a shot. Glad I did! My skull is kind of big and wide so can be difficult finding sunglasses that fit well. These felt a smidge snugger than my Tuna Alleys but after wearing for a week they fit perfectly. Like all Costa Del Mar sunglasses, these came with a hard shell case, microfiber lenses wipe, and a sticker. Also love the Costa Del Mar service... when the nose piece on my Tuna's went out about six months ago, I simply sent them to the manufacturer and they repaired free of charge... I just paid shipping. Had them change out the lenses for a nominal price at the same time since I scratched them up pretty good over the years. I have purchased Costa Del Mars for gifts and everyone I've ever given them to has been impressed. Would definitely recommend these shades to friends and family, even at the steep price points.

Value for money

The lens quality is superb. The scratch resistant is great. I've dropped them and  had it hit the dirt. On other pairs would be damaged or scratched. These had no blemish or marks on the lens. So very durable. But the best part about them is that the clarity of the lens is amazing. Soothing in bright sunlight and cuts through the glare without having to squint. I own several pairs of expensive brand sunglasses. I feel the lenses are more clear then my most expensive glasses. Also the style is very complimenting. Seems to be very similar to holbrook's which I like a lot. The frames are extremely durable and will take plenty of abuse without having to worry that your going to break or snap the arms. I accidently sat on them. I have to I was extremely surprised that it survived the rear end crush test.

Lenses scratched within a few days of regular wear and tear. They’re reasonably lightweight, but not as light as my old pair of RayBan Wayfarers. I bought these as a test run for Oakley Holbrooks. They’re easier on the wallet, but I’m disappointed they scratched so easily. Decent sunglasses for the price.
